mapper.sql: id, order_no, purchase_duration, create_time, begin_time, end_time, final_duration, terminal_id, cell_id, order_status, pay_status, user_id, keyt, detail
mapper.insert: insert into storage_service (id, order_no, purchase_duration, create_time, begin_time, end_time, final_duration, terminal_id, cell_id, order_status, pay_status, user_id, keyt, detail) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finalDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{terminalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cellId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{keyt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into storage_service
id,
order_no,
purchase_duration,
create_time,
begin_time,
end_time,
final_duration,
terminal_id,
cell_id,
order_status,
pay_status,
user_id,
keyt,
detail,

mapper.update:
update storage_service
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purchase_duration = #{purchaseDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
final_duration = #{finalDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
terminal_id = #{terminalId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cell_id = #{cellId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
keyt = #{keyt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update storage_service set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase_duration = #{purchaseDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, final_duration = #{finalDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, terminal_id = #{terminalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cell_id = #{cellId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, keyt = #{keyt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM storage_service WHERE user_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND order_status = 'WAITING' OR order_status = 'RUNNING'

SELECT storage_service.id, storage_service.order_no, storage_service.purchase_duration, storage_service.create_time, storage_service.keyt, storage_service.begin_time, storage_service.end_time, storage_service.final_duration, storage_service.terminal_id, storage_service.cell_id, storage_service.order_status, storage_service.pay_status, storage_service.user_id, storage_service.detail FROM storage_service INNER JOIN `user` ON storage_service.user_id = `user`.id WHERE user.open_id = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
